means: 圣人般的人（指特别善良、仁爱或有耐性的人）( saint的名词复数 )
（因其生死言行而被基督教会追封的）圣人

sentence.Network_cn: 这些孩子都取了圣徒的名字。

sentence.Network_en: Once a tough defensive team, the Saints now have the most porous defence in the league.
sentence.Network_cn: 圣徒队一度防御能力很强，现在却成了联盟里防守漏洞最多的队伍。

entry.tran: (基督教正式追封的)圣徒，圣人
entry.def: A saint is someone who has died and been officially recognized and honoured by the Christian church because his or her life was a perfect example of the way Christians should live.

example.ex: Every parish was named after a saint.
example.tran: 每个教区都以某位圣徒的名字命名。

entry.tran: 至善的人;极有耐心的人;道德高尚的人;圣人般的人
entry.def: If you refer to a living person as a saint, you mean that they are extremely kind, patient, and unselfish.

example.ex: My girlfriend is a saint to put up with me.
example.tran: 能够忍受我，我的女朋友真的很有耐心。
